tool_description:
You can generate custom QR codes using this API for any text, in any color and a custom logo on it.
Defaults:
"color": "black"
"bg_color": "white"
"img_b64": null
name: Customizable QR with Logo - MoruQR
title: Customizable QR with Logo - MoruQR

api_list.name: Create QR
api_list.description:
You can create QR codes of given data in any color and a custom logo on it. 
Defaults:
"color": "black"
"bg_color": "white"
"img_b64": null
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://customizable-qr-with-logo-moruqr.p.rapidapi.com/create-qr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "customizable-qr-with-logo-moruqr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://customizable-qr-with-logo-moruqr.p.rapidapi.com/create-qr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "customizable-qr-with-logo-moruqr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
